problem.markdown:
1. Ratio of Xd/Xq for cylindrical alternator is ------- Xd/Xq of salient pole machine
( ) greater than (x) less than ( ) Equal to ( ) None of the above
2. Steady state direct axis reactance is ---------- transient direct axis reactane
(x) greater than ( ) less than ( ) Equal to ( ) None of the above
3. In an hydro alternator, if Xd=1.15 then the value of Xq will be approximately
( ) 1.75 ( ) 15 (x) 0.75 ( ) 0.075
4. In Salient pole alternator the rotor diameter is -------- its length
(x) greater than ( ) lesser than ( ) Equal to ( ) None of the above
5. While conducting slip test, the synchronous machine runs at a slip ‘s’ and stator supply frequency ‘f’, the frequency of
1. voltage induced across open field terminals 2. envelope of the armature terminal voltage 3. envelope of the armature current, and 4. armature current will be respectively
( ) sf, sf,sf and f, ( ) sf, f, sf and f (x) f, sf, f and sf ( ) f, (1-s)f,(2-s)f and sf
6. When a synchronous motor is running at synchronous speed, the damper winding produces
(x) Damping toruqe ( ) Eddy current torque ( ) Driving torque ( ) No torque
7. The reactance of any machine is ------------- proportional to relucatance of flux path and ---------- proportional to square of number of turns
(x) inversely, directly ( ) directly, inversely ( ) directly, directly ( ) inversly, inversly
8. The armature reactance of salient pole synchronous machine
( ) is equal to Xd ( ) is equal to Xq (x) varies between Xd and Xq ( ) none of the above
9. The ratio of Xd to Xq in salent pole machine varies in the range
(x) 0.66 to 0.7 ( ) 0.3 to 0.0.5 ( ) 0.9 to 1.0 ( ) 1.0 to 1.5
10. By which test synchronous machine can be recognised as cylindrical or salient pole type?
(x) Slip Test ( ) Static Test ( ) Open circuit Test ( ) Short circuit Test
